name: Post-9/11
description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

key_work.title: September 11
key_work.brief_description: The world held its breath as two hijacked planes were crashed into the World Trade Center in New York City on 11 September 2001. TV networks around the world bore witness and millions of people saw the historic event unfold in real time.

constellations_primary.name: Post-9/11
constellations_primary.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

constellations_other.name: Spectacle
constellations_other.description: The moving image has captured some of history’s biggest moments. From newsreel shorts in cinemas before the show to the arrival of TV, nightly news and the 24-hour news cycle to social media, news has become a spectacle.

start.title: Fahrenheit 9/11
start.creator_credit: Michael Moore, Jim Czarnecki, Kathleen Glynn, BIM Distribuzione, Dog Eat Dog Films, Fellowship Adventure Group and Questar Entertainment
start.brief_description: Michael Moore’s view on how the Bush administration allegedly used the tragic events on 9/11 to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

end.title: My Country, My Country
end.brief_description: The director follows a Sunni Arab doctor as he prepares to run for the early 2005 elections in Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Laura Poitras’ informal trilogy of documentaries on a post-9/11 world began with My Country, My Country (2006), which chronicled Iraq under US occupation. Other films in the trilogy include The Oath (2010) and Citizenfour (2014).

start.title: Fahrenheit 9/11
start.creator_credit: Michael Moore, Jim Czarnecki, Kathleen Glynn, BIM Distribuzione, Dog Eat Dog Films, Fellowship Adventure Group and Questar Entertainment
start.brief_description: Michael Moore’s view on how the Bush administration allegedly used the tragic events on 9/11 to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

end.title: United 93
end.creator_credit: Paul Greengrass, Dinah Collin, Eric Fellner, Kate Solomon, Lloyd Levin, Michael Bronner, Tim Bevan, Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, StudioCanal, Universal Pictures, Working Title Films, Zak Productions and Dominic Watkins
end.headline_credit: France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2006
end.brief_description: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Paul Greengrass’ drama United 93 (2006) chronicled the events on board United Airlines Flight 93, which was hijacked during the attacks and crashed into a field following a passenger revolt.

start.title: United 93
start.creator_credit: Paul Greengrass, Dinah Collin, Eric Fellner, Kate Solomon, Lloyd Levin, Michael Bronner, Tim Bevan, Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, StudioCanal, Universal Pictures, Working Title Films, Zak Productions and Dominic Watkins
start.headline_credit: France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2006
start.brief_description: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

end.title: 25th Hour
end.creator_credit: Spike Lee, Sandra Hernandez, Jon Kilik, Julia Chasman, Tobey Maguire, 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Touchstone Pictures, James Chinlund and David Benioff
end.brief_description: In New York City in the days following the events of 9/11, Monty Brogan is a convicted drug dealer about to start a seven year prison sentence, and his final hours of freedom are devoted to preparing his girlfriend for his extended absence.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Spike Lee’s drama 25th Hour (2002) was in its planning stages when the September 11 attacks occurred, so the director decided to incorporate it into the script, with a pivotal scene taking place at Ground Zero, the destroyed site of the World Trade Center.

start.title: 25th Hour
start.creator_credit: Spike Lee, Sandra Hernandez, Jon Kilik, Julia Chasman, Tobey Maguire, 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Touchstone Pictures, James Chinlund and David Benioff
start.brief_description: In New York City in the days following the events of 9/11, Monty Brogan is a convicted drug dealer about to start a seven year prison sentence, and his final hours of freedom are devoted to preparing his girlfriend for his extended absence.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

end.title: Brick Lane
end.creator_credit: Sarah Gavron, Alison Owen, Chris Collins, Film4 Productions, Ingenious Media, Ruby Films, Abi Morgan and Laura Jones
end.brief_description: The grind of daily life as a Brick Lane Bangladessi as seen through the eyes of Nazneen (Chatterjee), who at 17 enters an arranged marriage with Chanu (Kaushik). Years later, living in east London with her family, she meets a young man Karim (Simpson).

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Directed by Sarah Gavron, Brick Lane (2007) is set against a socio-political background that includes the September 11 attacks and follows a period of heightened racial tension in the UK.

start.title: 11'09''01 - September 11
start.creator_credit: Alejandro González Iñárritu, Amos Gitai, Claude Lelouch, Danis Tanović, Idrissa Ouedraogo, Ken Loach, Mira Nair, Samira Makhmalbaf, Sean Penn, Shōhei Imamura, Youssef Chahine, Jacques Perrin, Nicolas Mauvernay, Catherine Dussart Productions (CDP), CIH Shorts, Comme des Cinémas, Galatée Films, Imamura Productions, La Générale de Production, Les Films 13, Les Films de la Plaine, Makhmalbaf Film House Productions, MISR International Films, Sequence 19 Productions, Sixteen Films, StudioCanal, Studio Maj, Zeta Film (MX), Daisuke Tengan, Marie-Jose Sanselme, Paul Laverty, Pierre Uytterhoeven, Sabrina Dhawan and Vladimir Vega
start.headline_credit: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Burkina Faso, Egypt, France, India, Iran, Israel, Japan, Mexico, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2002
start.brief_description: Filmmakers from all over the world provide short films – each of which is eleven minutes, nine seconds, and one frame of film in length – that offer differing perspectives on the 9/11 terrorist attacks.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

end.title: Now 7 Years Later
end.brief_description: NOW7 YEARS LATER is a video and sculptural installation, and was first staged at the Fremantle Arts Centre as a commission in response to the 50th anniversary of the City of Fremantle’s collection of art.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Australian artist Elvis Richardson’s work Now 7 Years Later explored the collective experience of people who had watched the events unfold on television, prompting them to recall their memories seven years later.

end.title: Fahrenheit 9/11
end.creator_credit: Michael Moore, Jim Czarnecki, Kathleen Glynn, BIM Distribuzione, Dog Eat Dog Films, Fellowship Adventure Group and Questar Entertainment
end.brief_description: Michael Moore’s view on how the Bush administration allegedly used the tragic events on 9/11 to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Michael Moore’s documentary Fahrenheit 9/11 (2004) also explored the effects of the 9/11 attacks, critiquing George W. Bush’s presidency, the war on Iraq and coverage in the media.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

links.description: Following the attacks on the World Trade Center, the anthology film 11‘09”01 September 11 (2002) premiered and featured directors from different countries exploring international reactions to 9/11.
